title: sex on train:A Pair Got Captured On CCTV While Having Sex On A Late Night Train From Glasgow To Edinburgh
text:
PDA is not the same as having sex in public, the latter is punishable in most parts of the world. What is it with people unable to keep it in their pants? First, a naked couple was captured on a Google street view camera getting all cozy in public, and now a CCTV footage of a couple having a go in an empty train carriage is going viral.

The raunchy couple was reportedly in the late-night train from Glasgow to Edinburgh, when the CCTV in the carriage caught their dirty tryst and somehow, it got leaked online.

ScotRail chiefs reportedly assured to work with the police to find the couple.

“This is shocking behavior for people to be engaging in on a train.It’s clear the couple were so drunk they weren’t aware of what was going on round about them,” The Sun quotes a passenger as saying.

Another one reportedly said, “What if a family with young kids had walked into the carriage or any elderly person. It outrageous that they think this is acceptable or funny.”

Yet another one mused, “Couldn’t they have just waited until they got home.”

The video is available on The Sun’s page, and in the clip the couple can be seen kissing before unzipping each others’ pants and lying down on the table.

Talking about the indecent public act, a ScotRail spokesperson reportedly said, “Anti-social behavior has no place on Scotland’s Railway, and we will continue to work with the British Transport Police to clamp down on unacceptable conduct.”

Well, the couple has a forever proof of their sexcapade for sure.
